name: Tiny Destiny
description:
SWIPE to MOVE doors, enemies and weapons Push enemies to your hero for fighting, upgrade your character with weapons and build everything you find.

Find the Easter Egg in every level

"Tiny Destiny" is a roguelike action puzzle adventure with building elements where you control movement of everything you see on tiles. But! This main character... he prefers to stay in one place during his adventure. Staying is just his thing. A wise man said: "If Hero doesn't goes to chest, than chest goes to Hero!"
